title: U.S. Car Brands Will Benefit Most From Electric Vehicle Tax Breaks
description: Rules that take effect on Tuesday will limit the $7,500 credits to electric cars made domestically with minerals from the U.S. or trade allies.

title: Judge Delays Fox and Dominion Trial by a Day
description: Opening statements in the $1.6 billion defamation case against Fox News were set to begin on Monday.

title: Satellites Threaten Astronomy, but a Few Scientists See an Opportunity
description: Mega-constellations built by SpaceX, Amazon and other companies could carry thousands of sensors that could aid research into gamma rays, space weather and other subjects.
